column3: “Ripped two bong hits with a buddy. Got nice. I had a busy, productive day, was planning to go to bed. After those bong rips I finished some work I was putting off until the morning & got some writing done. Relaxed my back while I sat at my desk writing this, writing my book  and doing my work. When I got up after 3 hours with little to no back pain & was ready for bed. Nice sound sleep. Excellent color, aroma,& taste...”

“Damn this is really good quality bud. Super creeper and body high is amazing. Feels super spacy also so a good one for those deep conversations about Ufo's, Paranormal and Sasquatch......you know you do......”

“Found it by chance last time I went to the Iron street location. Sent my girlfriend back to get more and it was gone! I searched at a bunch of different stores and found it at another one, but it had less THC and was 8 dollars more expensive. But....today I went back to 2020 on Iron, and its back!!! It's purple color is better than ever, so please save me some more ;) 
****This is his girlfriend writing this, as he i...”
“Such a tasty strain. Got 2 grams from a local shop. Beautiful buds as well with a lot of red and green hairs as well as a hint of purple. Smokes great. Puts body in relax mode.”

“Very strong pungent smell and delicious taste. It makes a very nice hybrid giving a slow coming indica body high but also giving a sense of energy. If you don't take advantage of the energy while its there then couch lock will likely set in. Strong meds and one that I like to use for my back pain.”

“My loving Mrs. Budsey picked me up a tasty pre roll of Karma Originals Ace of Spades. I really was impressed. 

The smell was great. Very herbal and sweet, almost reminded me of Jager. 

The taste was excellent. Right of the inhale it fills your taste buds with herbal sweetness! The exhale was very Mellow, sweet and smooth. Didn't have a single cough.

Now to the stone. Very behind the eyes and back of the skull feel...”

“Picked up a batch of this favorite that had gone purple. I loved it before, but WOW. It adds an additional layer of muscle relaxation and emotional upliftment. They say the plants were just beneath the air conditioner, and that the purple was an accident as they don't cold shock. However if you want to make an already great strain that little bit better, get Ace of Spades to go purple. Like many Jack the Ripper cross...”

“For the most part I'm what you'd call a joint guy. Sit back in a chair , looking at the stars, nice 68degrees outside and taking a slow but deep hit , here and there to cut away the stress. Puff puff give? I don't think so. I'm a little self serving when I'm in relax mode. Anyway, ..... I broke out my little hand held pipe filled it with some Ace of Spades that I've had for awhile . I swear flower becomes stronger an...”

“The taste of this one didn't blow me away like it did other reviewers, but it wasn't bad by any means--just not the main event. After a bowl of this in the vaporizer, I was feeling really good and my back pain was significantly reduced. Note how many reviewers agree that this strain causes euphoria; there's a reason! I was dancing on sunshine for at least an hour or two. I was then able to sit down and get some compu...”

“If this is the Ace of Spades from the growers: The Happy Crowd.

Lots of stems and water leaves (The little leaves that fall off right before it's time to harvest) Which means this plant was harvested too early, not cured properly either. It was very earthy, which can be a good thing sometimes, but it was not so in this case. 

I have Rheumatoid Arthritis, The pain in my body changes drastically in location and all t...”

“First time trying and I enjoyed the earthy pungent but not to harsh and with just a hint of berry taste.  Smell was nice but not overpowering.  Packed a raw cone and would have stopped at half but enjoyed smoking.  Effects came on slowly for me but were very noticeable and provided excellent pain, nausea anxiety and depression relief.  I didn't get hungry, but stomach was calmed.  I would purchase again.”
“A couple hits of ace of spades puts my mind at ease and allows me to relax and focus. I use it as an alternative to ADHD medicine. I’m dialed in when dealt the Ace of Spades.”

“This is simply a terrific hybrid. I tend to favor Sativas and Sativa dominant hybrids as I need a med that allows me to work. 

A strong Sativa high kicks in immediately with the first bong rip. It's focused, energetic, at the same time it's relaxing. The Indica component provides a good body stone to go along with the head high. Only downside: the relaxing component can turn into sleepiness, that depends on how much...”

“Brief review: 
This strain is very strong and has amazing effects it helps with sleep pain and is a great mood booster This is the perfect strain when chilling with friends. 
Gets rid of much stress and anxiety.

My experience:
So I smoked .7  Out of a pipe it hit fast and strong along with the serious dry mouth.
I felt very relaxed and when I layed down I felt the euphoria rushing up and down my spine I ended up pas...”

“the Ace of Spades has the essence of chocolate covered strawberries. So delicious!! It burns so smooth and clean, nothing left but white ash, so you know it's clean. Organically grown and it shows in the flavor. Dense and covered in sticky crystals. The sticky resin in this bud really burns great. Large hits are easy, very smooth. The feeling is a body stone mixed with a bit of a cerebral high. I was feeling terrible...”

“The thing that stood out to me about this bud was the look. It was beautiful! Light green STRAIGHT CAKED in trichs and covered in these short dark orange hairs. The smell was appealing kind of lemony and earthy. The earthiness comes through in the exhale and stays as an aftertaste. The high is very strong. It starts as an almost racy Sativa high than mellows out to a nice body stone later. Medicinally I would say its...”

“First time trying and I enjoyed the earthy pungent but not to harsh and with just a hint of berry taste.  Smell was nice but not overpowering.  Packed a raw cone and would have stopped at half but enjoyed smoking.  Effects came on slowly for me but were very noticeable and provided excellent pain, nausea anxiety and depression relief.  I didn't get hungry, but stomach was calmed.  I would purchase again.”

“Makes me very relaxed yet still motivated.  If I want to lay down and sleep I can do that too.  Took some joint pain and menstrual cramps away as well.  I am an extremely anxious person and this made me chill out without feeling like I HAD to sleep like some other strains”

“This strain was one of the first that I tried as a patient and it was awesome. It has a great flavor, easy to hit, and provides a very chill buzz about it that knocked the sh*t outta my stress level, and decreased my pain significantly. Purchased from THC in Salem”
“Knockout gas, great taste. Only smoked once and fell asleep quite quickly.”
“Some of the most powerful weed I've ever smoked. Beautiful frost coating on the nugs with purple undertone. Creeps up on you and overtakes your body into another world.”

“What a strange indica! It hits me like a Big Splashy Sunshine Sativa that made me hyper and a bit dizzy. The body stone is not that noticeable, but it definitely has a very clear, cerebral high to it.  

I think I would go easy with this guy. The smell is lusciously fruity, with fruity smoke and after taste. Makes you want to smoke more. Good for pain, but maybe not so much for sleep or even to do things that require...”
“Left me feeling very creatively energized and marginally less paranoid than usual, so it's definitely one of my favorites so far!!”

“Ace of Spades is a delicious strain and one of the prettiest I have ever seen! Colors of deep blue and purples, bright green and red hairs make this bud unique and exotic, out of this world. Great taste, with hints of berry and fruit with a little citrus mixed in. Great high, balanced and smooth. Super relaxing but not cloudy or a knockout. I HIGHLY recommend. Anything crossed with Jack the Ripper has been fantastic!...”
“Knockout gas, great taste. Only smoked once and fell asleep quite quickly.”

“Awesome taste, very woody and aromatic. The smell of the bud itself is like a sharp cheese. Nice dense frosty compact buds with thick orange hairs. The trichomes on the leaves are very heavily present throughout. The effects are just what you want in an indica, super mellow and relaxed, however, I was able to pop off a few work emails with ease as well. Will definitely intice hunger as well.”

“Super dense buds that fluff up beautifully when you grind it. The smell is just glorious, sweet and earthy. The vapor is smooth and easy to hold. The effects come on pretty quickly which is nice for quick pain relief. It feels like a true indica with a nice body stone that I can feel from head to toe. If I smoke a lot, it'll make me want to lay down and watch tv or go to sleep. If I smoke a little, then I feel good a...”
“Good nighttime strain, very relaxing and calming. Good for pain, anxiety, insomnia, and stress.”
“Really, really dope smoke overall. Very relaxing but not too sedating. Would be able to smoke in the morning and still be functional but also attentive and focused.”

“One of the best tasting strains I have ever tried. The smoke is so smooth its like breathing into an orange rind with a hint of grape flavors. Very mellow, relaxing high. Not overpowering, without sacrificing potentcy.”

“I tried this for the first time last night to help with my insomnia. Usually, even after smoking a little I take hours to fall asleep. Usually knitting or watching T.V. until sleep takes hold. Then I wake at 12:25. Last night...I had a very small amount. And within an hour I was out cold. And slept solidly all night waking refreshed and ready to go. It was amazing. Trying it again tonight to see if I get the same res...”
“Fantastic for my insomnia. Kicks in quickly (I make a green dragon tincture with it) and lasts for at least six hours. Really great heavy body sleepiness.”

“Some Ace of Spades crumble here! This stuff is super light in color. Very crumbled but not to difficult to work with. I can press it down and it sticks itself into small blobs easily. I would never guess this to be an Indica strain. The effects were full body to say the least if not even a little more cerebral. Either way she is a wonderful strain. Wonderful dabbing experience. Wonderfully strong high! Very noticeabl...”
“Had good body vibes after a nice size dab, went right to bed after that. Woke up very refreshed.”

“It’s been a month since I got my medical & I tried this hoping I’d like it as I prefer indicas. I have issues with anxiety and paranoia after smoking cannabis & I can say this didn’t aggravate either. It was a good “right before bed” strain that put me right to sleep with good dreams (I suffer from PTSD/night terrors & this was great for that). I watched a little TV, relaxed & next thing I know it’s 7:00 am. From wha...”
“the best I've ever had.. was high on this when cayde died in Destiny 2”
“Very nice, relaxing body high. Taste is unique and pleasant change to most bud. Would recommend this for sleep.”

“Ace of spades is an amazing indica 
Warning: make sure you’re scheduled is clear before smoking it is very strong yet injoying.
You do not need to use very much I’ve been smoking for over a year and just one bowl Gows a long way.
It last pretty long.”

“I am not sure what happened. I got this at Canuvo in Biddeford, ME. Lately their stuff doesn't taste like it is being flushed properly so I am not sure if that is the problem or if it is the strain itself, but this stuff actually made me angry, paranoid and created almost like a temporary bad thought OCD type of mindset, when I don't even suffer that condition. No one else has had a bad reaction to this stuff? Seriou...”
“Fantastic for my insomnia. Kicks in quickly (I make a green dragon tincture with it) and lasts for at least six hours. Really great heavy body sleepiness.”
“So far one of the best marijuana strains I have I found for excellent pain relief without sleepiness or being groggy.”
“Still great. Frosty.”
“Very nice, relaxing body high. Taste is unique and pleasant change to most bud. Would recommend this for sleep.”
“Had good body vibes after a nice size dab, went right to bed after that. Woke up very refreshed.”

“I am not sure what happened. I got this at Canuvo in Biddeford, ME. Lately their stuff doesn't taste like it is being flushed properly so I am not sure if that is the problem or if it is the strain itself, but this stuff actually made me angry, paranoid and created almost like a temporary bad thought OCD type of mindset, when I don't even suffer that condition. No one else has had a bad reaction to this stuff? Seriou...”

“I tried this for the first time last night to help with my insomnia. Usually, even after smoking a little I take hours to fall asleep. Usually knitting or watching T.V. until sleep takes hold. Then I wake at 12:25. Last night...I had a very small amount. And within an hour I was out cold. And slept solidly all night waking refreshed and ready to go. It was amazing. Trying it again tonight to see if I get the same res...”

“It’s been a month since I got my medical & I tried this hoping I’d like it as I prefer indicas. I have issues with anxiety and paranoia after smoking cannabis & I can say this didn’t aggravate either. It was a good “right before bed” strain that put me right to sleep with good dreams (I suffer from PTSD/night terrors & this was great for that). I watched a little TV, relaxed & next thing I know it’s 7:00 am. From wha...”

“When life is hard I pick up that card with the ace of spades, call’em over to my place!
When my body aches and my mind isn’t right. I go for some ace of spades, body and mind are treated for any problem. My mind embraces joy and peace. My nerves are settled and my muscles are messaged. No stress and no pain. Strong euphoria that settles to a happy contentment. Smoke is smooth and tasty like cherry cola candy. Lung ex...”
“Fantastic for my insomnia. Kicks in quickly (I make a green dragon tincture with it) and lasts for at least six hours. Really great heavy body sleepiness.”

“I tried this for the first time last night to help with my insomnia. Usually, even after smoking a little I take hours to fall asleep. Usually knitting or watching T.V. until sleep takes hold. Then I wake at 12:25. Last night...I had a very small amount. And within an hour I was out cold. And slept solidly all night waking refreshed and ready to go. It was amazing. Trying it again tonight to see if I get the same res...”

“I like it. It's mellow. Smoke was smooth. Didn't notice much of a taste really. Gonna light up another bong and break it up a bit better. The quality is there though. This is what I call gourmet. Only certain strains make my gourmet list. Stay tuned.”

“This strain was very effective. I'm going to keep the story short, but I had a terrible day, went to my grandfathers funeral and then come home, and I get dumped by girlfriend. This combined with the fact that I hadn't smoked in 2 weeks, I was on the couch at midnight. Slept like a log and woke up at 2pm the next day. In all a great stress reliever. As for looks, the nugs have very light dusting of purple. The tricom...”

“When life is hard I pick up that card with the ace of spades, call’em over to my place!
When my body aches and my mind isn’t right. I go for some ace of spades, body and mind are treated for any problem. My mind embraces joy and peace. My nerves are settled and my muscles are messaged. No stress and no pain. Strong euphoria that settles to a happy contentment. Smoke is smooth and tasty like cherry cola candy. Lung ex...”

“It’s been a month since I got my medical & I tried this hoping I’d like it as I prefer indicas. I have issues with anxiety and paranoia after smoking cannabis & I can say this didn’t aggravate either. It was a good “right before bed” strain that put me right to sleep with good dreams (I suffer from PTSD/night terrors & this was great for that). I watched a little TV, relaxed & next thing I know it’s 7:00 am. From wha...”
“I see it in your eyes, take one hit and die.”
“This was good stuff”

“Super dense buds that fluff up beautifully when you grind it. The smell is just glorious, sweet and earthy. The vapor is smooth and easy to hold. The effects come on pretty quickly which is nice for quick pain relief. It feels like a true indica with a nice body stone that I can feel from head to toe. If I smoke a lot, it'll make me want to lay down and watch tv or go to sleep. If I smoke a little, then I feel good a...”
“the best I've ever had.. was high on this when cayde died in Destiny 2”

“When life is hard I pick up that card with the ace of spades, call’em over to my place!
When my body aches and my mind isn’t right. I go for some ace of spades, body and mind are treated for any problem. My mind embraces joy and peace. My nerves are settled and my muscles are messaged. No stress and no pain. Strong euphoria that settles to a happy contentment. Smoke is smooth and tasty like cherry cola candy. Lung ex...”
“I see it in your eyes, take one hit and die.”

“One of the best tasting strains I have ever tried. The smoke is so smooth its like breathing into an orange rind with a hint of grape flavors. Very mellow, relaxing high. Not overpowering, without sacrificing potentcy.”

“This is something I'd pass on next time, however if you're in a stressful rut, I'd highly recommend this.  This was the only good thing it helped me with, melting my stress away.  This helped with physical and mental stress 5/5, but I still had a lot of my physical pain, inflammation, muscle pain, and so on.  Smoked this in my bong, tasted like sweet pine and nothing else.  Not much else to say about this, kind of a ...”
“This was good stuff”
“Can't complain about the strain on any way. The taste is perfect and the sedating effects are so very comforting as if being hugged by the high.  Not to mention the effects last forever.”

“The one parent in this strain, Jack The Ripper, is an amazing strain. It's in so many strains: Mickeys Kush, Agent Orange, Chernobyl, Jesu OG, 9 lb hammer, etc...
This particular strain is a great night time strain. I normally stay up until 2am but after taking a few dabs I'm about to go to sleep!”

“Strain: Ace of Spades (Black Cherry Soda / Jack the Ripper cross -- Indica)
THC: 19.71%
CBD: 0.03%
Grower: Unknown
Location found: Portland Canna Connection
Date purchased: 3.7.16 
Price: $6/g
Weight: 1.1g
Method of Consumption: Herb Iron and small bong 
Smell: I have been on a Jack Herer rampage of finally understanding why the crosses are so grand. I wish I was the first to smell Black Cherry Soda and put the two t...”
“So far one of the best marijuana strains I have I found for excellent pain relief without sleepiness or being groggy.”
“I see it in your eyes, take one hit and die.”

“When life is hard I pick up that card with the ace of spades, call’em over to my place!
When my body aches and my mind isn’t right. I go for some ace of spades, body and mind are treated for any problem. My mind embraces joy and peace. My nerves are settled and my muscles are messaged. No stress and no pain. Strong euphoria that settles to a happy contentment. Smoke is smooth and tasty like cherry cola candy. Lung ex...”
“It makes me cranky. Maybe better solo.”

“Fun strain good heady effects great hybrid messed with my head a bit smoked out of my bubbler right before I took the my dog for a walk lost in my mind the whole walk great hybrid. Will buy again for sure when it comes back around”

“Apple tasting and smelling. Immediate effects of 
relaxation, delivers a 1:45-ish high. I'll smoke this anyday”
“Still great. Frosty.”
“Pretty good. Looked great, but didn't smell that strong. Kind of smelled like tea. Definitely got me high, just not one I'd buy again.”
“Pretty weak although I have a huge tolerance. Probably a good strain for new smokers to enjoy.”
“Looks and tastes great, kind of nice with a late afternoon meal. Lots of citrus on the nose, and a dense, oily smoke. High is pleasant and mellow.”
“Very nice, relaxing body high. Taste is unique and pleasant change to most bud. Would recommend this for sleep.”
“Can't complain about the strain on any way. The taste is perfect and the sedating effects are so very comforting as if being hugged by the high.  Not to mention the effects last forever.”

“I thought this was a saliva when I bought it (oil )and mixed it with some blue dream oil. The effect of the two was mind blowing. Highest I've ever been.  I don't know what it is like alone..but the combo with blue dream was like a mega saliva.”

“I only use pot when I play guitar (about once a week), and I've tried around 20 different strains looking for maximum creativity & focus, with enough energy to play for around 4 hours. 
Some strains that I've found helpful are: Cinex, Green Crack, Ripped Bubba, Strawberry Dream, & oddly, Charlie Sheen, but ACE OF SPADES is the BEST yet, by a good margin.
If you're looking for some enhanced musicianship, you need to t...”
“I'll never go anywhere else.”

“This strain is very relaxing nice hard hit with amazing flavor it tastes like everything Granddaddy Purple wants to be not to dis I love Grand Daddy Purple except for it's got kind of a peppery flavor I've had one granddaddy purple that was pretty grapey being nice anyways I digress this train is very nice and relaxing it'll put you in a very mellow laid-back mood it has a lot of medical qualities and it will allevia...”
“Surprisingly effective. Don’t let the THC level fool you. Even though it’s not way up there, it’s one of the most effective strains I’ve had for helping with relaxation, insomnia and pain relief.”

“This bud was pretty darn potent smoked out of the bong. I smoked a couple bong hits of some sativa hybrid first (like 4 lungfuls of smoke) then I busted out my freshly purchased Ace of spades buds and loaded the bong once... the Indica Ace of spades overpowered the other weed so making me feel stoned pretty heavily for 30minutes after toking up. I got a dreamy dazed type of feeling in my head and wanted to sit down t...”
“Passed tf out! 😴😴😴”

“Quite possibly my least favorite strain, and i’ve tried easily 200 strains by now. First off, this has the worst smell I think I have ever smelled in my entire life. It smelled like raw olive oil and rotten eggs. Its revolting, not to mention It also made me paranoid and anxious. Don’t waste your time with this one!! I’m usually an indica fan and this did nothing for me.”
“Felt great after this.”

“This is a very heady Indica.  I'm surprised it doesn't have a higher rating.  This is real trippy strains a kin to Deathstar.  My wife and I are fucked up on it.  It distorts your perception like fuck.  Go slow, give it a minute then see if you want more.”
“Definitely an indica -- strong in the jaw, to quote positivesmash, my teeth feel high. It's a good, happy high. Enough head effects to have video game" vision. Pretty calm

“Pretty goood PRETTY GOOD
mix it with a little wuki and BAME you feel so relaxed and at peace”

“Beautiful looking bud , decent sized nugs. Was very smooth and tasted good. I’m glad I bought an oz ( from ganja express) I have a high tolerance level due to the fact I’m a daily smoker. Hope this helps if someone’s debating on trying this strain! Very relaxing”
“awesome product  for relaxing but does little to nothing for my pain.”

“I gotta tell ya, for what I smoke got, this is my new favorite. PTSD, anxiety, and some neverending back pain from a accident last year all taken down to a very livable ground. One bowl and done. My mind slows down, all that stress melts away and I can just chill. My back still hurts but I don't need a percocet and that's fucking perfect for me. I get that nice thunder blanket hug. Not heavy like weighed down but tha...”
“one of my new favs”
“Good strain with great flavor, Vaporize for best results. So smelly!”
“awesome product  for relaxing but does little to nothing for my pain.”

“When grown with love, Ace of Spades is fire! I love this strain.  Don't let the indica lable fool you, its not extremely sedative.  Made me more chatty and lively in social settings.  Great for passing around at parties and sharing with good friends!”

“I gotta tell ya, for what I smoke got, this is my new favorite. PTSD, anxiety, and some neverending back pain from a accident last year all taken down to a very livable ground. One bowl and done. My mind slows down, all that stress melts away and I can just chill. My back still hurts but I don't need a percocet and that's fucking perfect for me. I get that nice thunder blanket hug. Not heavy like weighed down but tha...”
“Another killer indica! love the taste and smell. For a seasoned smoker this strain does the job. Need to find some concentrate of ace of spades asap!”
“one of my new favs”
“The Ace of Spades shatter is probably one of my all time favorite mixes!”
“Good strain with great flavor, Vaporize for best results. So smelly!”

“great stuff, the inner colors of the buds had me giggly from start to finish. i loved breaking up the orange and green easter eggs to find a very dense purple crystal palace.  kinda got me in the eyes would need drops if i cared what others thought”

“I gotta tell ya, for what I smoke got, this is my new favorite. PTSD, anxiety, and some neverending back pain from a accident last year all taken down to a very livable ground. One bowl and done. My mind slows down, all that stress melts away and I can just chill. My back still hurts but I don't need a percocet and that's fucking perfect for me. I get that nice thunder blanket hug. Not heavy like weighed down but tha...”

“great stuff, the inner colors of the buds had me giggly from start to finish. i loved breaking up the orange and green easter eggs to find a very dense purple crystal palace.  kinda got me in the eyes would need drops if i cared what others thought”
“sort of like eating a good tasting but super mild pepper, no?”
“smells like pubes lol tastes like berry asshole. pretty good high tho”
“nice flavor and effect.”
“Nice fruity taste. High quality stain.”
“sort of like eating a good tasting but super mild pepper, no?”
“nice flavor and effect.”
“Nice fruity taste. High quality stain.”
“This strain has a woody / minty /piney  taste. Strong body buzz and head high. orange hairs, pretty nugs.”
“Knocks me out every time”
“It helps me sleep and it leaves like new when I get up really good strean.”
“Fine strain. Wouldn't go out of my way to buy again but buds looked fantastic. Nice taste. Smooth, relaxed, sedated body high.”
“very nice mellow and productive buzz! highly recommend”
“to the guys at hanging gardens especially Zachary you guys are awesome. Thanks for recommending this strain, and very prompt and courteous service too! 2 thumbs up!”
“I really liked this strain because it was an indica I could smoke throughout the day without being in a haze. it helped with my back pain and also with my anxiety. pretty to look at as well 😏”
“Sticky sort of icky, made the jay I rolled too dense to smoke. Had a couple hits of partially cashed jay in bowl. Wasn't as stoned as I would like though my body was very relaxed.”
“One of the best I've had”
“This will be my worst review ever. Not much flavor. Tasted like organic mushrooms.   Very mellow high for an indica.  Will not buy again.”
“got some of this at Cannabis LLC in Springfield OR.  Tested at 29.9% THC!  Great taste, incredible head and body  high.”
“Not much flavor. Kind of a weak thc % as well.”
“Not the best tasting but it's smooth af”

“This was the first strain I have ever purchased for recreation the first month it was legal in WA state. Paid $38. For a gram! Wish I could say it was worth it. It was a fine, mellow smoke, not for the price I paid.”
“It is a great strain for relaxation and want to take a personal day on the couch.”
“I stayed aroused any time I've smoked this.  Will Definitely be smoking this b4 sex 🍆😱😄”
“great heady, steady buzz. not overpowering, not passive, just a good happy high. good looking, super purple buds. I enjoyed it greatly & I'm happy I have more.”
“wasn't too impressed by this strain, just felt a little out of it but that's about it.”
“ace of spades is really great I love it”
“WOW! This is one to try if you get the chance. Distinct Flavors and Aroma, Full spectrum balanced high from what I've smoked.”
“I have been searching for Ace, and have yet to find it !! By far top 5 strains for me!! everyone I know highly values this strain and so I'm giving ♤. ☆☆☆☆☆”

“Great for right before bed, a strong body high that will leave you nice and drowsy for the night. It was so sticky that I couldn't even use a grinder and ended up using scissors to chop it up. Definitely a couch lock high but very potent and great for listening to music. One of my favorite strains so far up there with blue dream.”
“Excellent body relaxation, but without making you lazy. I felt good and uplifted, but not euphoric.”
“When done right, this is a fantastic strain to blaze up on. All the great lemon pine terpenes and a nice heady high.”
“asked the budtender for something that'd help with my insomnia. she recommended this and I think I was out cold ten minutes after my first hit.”

“I grew this one outdoors last summer in 2012.  I'm usually a big fan of the 'purples' and not only love the buzz, but the overall deep purple color(s) of the leaves.  One of the things I loved about this strain was that the leaves stayed green...but the nugs themselves turned purple with spots of what can only be described as 'red wine' in color.  One of the most eye catching, beautiful plants.”
“Very nice flavor”

“I gotta tell ya, for what I smoke got, this is my new favorite. PTSD, anxiety, and some neverending back pain from a accident last year all taken down to a very livable ground. One bowl and done. My mind slows down, all that stress melts away and I can just chill. My back still hurts but I don't need a percocet and that's fucking perfect for me. I get that nice thunder blanket hug. Not heavy like weighed down but tha...”
“Great for severe chronic back pain, with a nice relaxed felling and still able to be somewhat functional.”

“Definitely a creeper, took a bit to actually get going. Very strong as well, just a couple of hits went a long way. Absolute body high - full vibrations through the body paired with heavy limbs and almost immediate hunger increase. It’s a smooth high that really just washes over you calmly. Very very enjoyable high, but definitely for the end of the day. Grab your self some food, and get ready to veg. 

The only down...”
“awesome product  for relaxing but does little to nothing for my pain.”

“This is a wonderfully soothing smoke. I planned on taking a nice walk but I ended sitting in the sun for about two hours and really appreciating my surroundings. Ace of Spades really makes you notice and enjoy your space but from a seated position. I like this one a lot.”
“Lovely purple hued buds. Made me very relaxed yet awake enough for conversations. Seemed to make time slow down a bit”

“Beautiful looking bud , decent sized nugs. Was very smooth and tasted good. I’m glad I bought an oz ( from ganja express) I have a high tolerance level due to the fact I’m a daily smoker. Hope this helps if someone’s debating on trying this strain! Very relaxing”

“Just got Ace of Spades today, & I have to say, it is delicious!! Nice body high & I feel so chill. Even better, my Pax 2 makes it even sweeter than hitting a bowl. Puff puff pass.... nope! It’s all mine!! 🍁”
“Mellow smoke in a e-pen form. Great for insomnia, but in smaller doses I can chill with friends and not need a pillow🤘🏻”
“So smooth. nice mellow relaxed buzz. Didn't give me couch lock.  my new favorite strain. I highly recommend”
“This strain has a woody / minty /piney  taste. Strong body buzz and head high. orange hairs, pretty nugs.”
“Definitely an indica -- strong in the jaw, to quote positivesmash, my teeth feel high. It's a good, happy high. Enough head effects to have video game" vision. Pretty calm

“This is a very heady Indica.  I'm surprised it doesn't have a higher rating.  This is real trippy strains a kin to Deathstar.  My wife and I are fucked up on it.  It distorts your perception like fuck.  Go slow, give it a minute then see if you want more.”

“Quite possibly my least favorite strain, and i’ve tried easily 200 strains by now. First off, this has the worst smell I think I have ever smelled in my entire life. It smelled like raw olive oil and rotten eggs. Its revolting, not to mention It also made me paranoid and anxious. Don’t waste your time with this one!! I’m usually an indica fan and this did nothing for me.”

“Definitely a creeper, but once it hits you it’s niiiiiiice. I smoked it in my garage and before I knew it I was performing If I Could Turn Back Time by Cher to an audience of myself. Highly recommend this one. I love Black Cherry Soda but haven’t had Jack the Ripper (although have definitely wanted to try it) so I was excited about this and it did not disappoint.”

“This strain I tried in vape cartridge by Curio Wellness. The oil within the cartridge was very dark and viscous. Smell and taste I would best describe as earthy/ dirt like. I am not too particularly found of it. It seems to be very short acting, I found myself having to vape again every 15-30mins to continue pain management. I did night have couch lock or increased hunger while I used this strain. I tend to like to u...”
“Very Relaxing.”
“loved it helped me relax calmed stress level made me have energy at first then need to rest feel later on definitely got the munchies pine flavor I thought but other may not good for day or night”
“Good bud... Felt a great high... Nice body high... I’ll smoke this strain again...”
“Great buds ,  really relaxing , and focused buzz , one bowl on the bubbler n yup... Tis the season . and happy newyear”

“I had a hard time placing the smell of the one, funky. Real frosty nugs that are compact as you’d expect from an indica but really bright green. Ten minutes in and the effects are calming of the mind but not fuzzy or cloudy. Also a nice body high without the heavy limbs of other indicas. I I made cookies cleaned up and then ate way too much. Will be an after work go to for sure.”
“very nice mellow and productive buzz! highly recommend”
“Nice fruity taste. High quality stain.”
“Felt great after this.”
“Passed tf out! 😴😴😴”

“This bud was pretty darn potent smoked out of the bong. I smoked a couple bong hits of some sativa hybrid first (like 4 lungfuls of smoke) then I busted out my freshly purchased Ace of spades buds and loaded the bong once... the Indica Ace of spades overpowered the other weed so making me feel stoned pretty heavily for 30minutes after toking up. I got a dreamy dazed type of feeling in my head and wanted to sit down t...”
“Surprisingly effective. Don’t let the THC level fool you. Even though it’s not way up there, it’s one of the most effective strains I’ve had for helping with relaxation, insomnia and pain relief.”

“This strain is very relaxing nice hard hit with amazing flavor it tastes like everything Granddaddy Purple wants to be not to dis I love Grand Daddy Purple except for it's got kind of a peppery flavor I've had one granddaddy purple that was pretty grapey being nice anyways I digress this train is very nice and relaxing it'll put you in a very mellow laid-back mood it has a lot of medical qualities and it will allevia...”
“I'll never go anywhere else.”

“I only use pot when I play guitar (about once a week), and I've tried around 20 different strains looking for maximum creativity & focus, with enough energy to play for around 4 hours. 
Some strains that I've found helpful are: Cinex, Green Crack, Ripped Bubba, Strawberry Dream, & oddly, Charlie Sheen, but ACE OF SPADES is the BEST yet, by a good margin.
If you're looking for some enhanced musicianship, you need to t...”

“This is the very first strain of pot I ever smoked when I was 14. Whenever I taste that sweet earthy berry smoke enter my lungs, its as if time has stood still, and I am back in high school again ditching class to smoke with my buddies. Definitely a versatile strain in the sense it is a powerful indica but when smoked during the day the mental clarity shines through more as a sativa than when smoked at night, might b...”

“While this strain definitely did the job and made me do a number on my refrigerator, it wasn't that satisfying overall.  Still smelled and tasted great (it was organic), but even when I mixed it with more potent bud the buzz left something to be desired.  3/5”

“This indica dominant (70 percent) strain will have you in a great mood in no time. I particularly noticed euphoria within 5 minutes of consuming 0.25 grams via a water bong. The euphoria was just the right amount to be able to relax and hang out. Don't consume too much, unless you want to become hungry.”
“The first time I had Ace of Spades I rolled up and was high as hell but then it went away about a half hour later.  Was good at first but didn't like how sorry the high was.”
“One if the best I've had”
“Nice and easy relaxed feeling”
“My absolute FAVORITE strain! Cannot wait for them to get more in”
“I like it has a very nice aroma smokes well very energetic high”
“Awesome weed for a party, more on the relaxed side of a high. pungent and earthy almost.”

“Oh my, our group reviews this strain as exceptional. We haven't laughed some good long belly laughs like that in a long time. Classic all over body relaxation and good pain relief. Really fun on game night with pictionary or to watch a comedy together. Strong body stone after two hits on the vaporizer.Would choose this strain again:)Not for complex tasks.”
“Put me right to sleep. Very relaxing.”

“Just the strain I was looking for. I love the smell, taste, looks, and effects of this strain a lot. A lot stronger then most, so if you can find it for a great price your definitely  getting your money's worth”

“First time medicating with this strain and I really like it. I used the oil form of the strain in a Bhang pen. Looking forward to trying out the parent strains, Jack the Ripper & Black Cherry Soda in the future (:”
“This strain has great flavor that matches its beautiful colors. The bud was always some fire with a nice care free high, recommend for anyone looking for a tasty smoke and a lazy day”

“I love the flavor. And the berry flavor stays on you pallet long after smoking. It really helps with my arthritis in my toes and fingers after being on my feet all day at work. Also helps me wind down and fall asleep easier after work.”

“Rogues Ravens Farm Ace of Spades is really Stoney. The high is intense right at first. The taste has a little fruity taste . It didn't have the smell and taste from other AOS I have gotten but it was still a nice flavor.  The THC level is just over twenty three percent with a 0.06% of CBD.”
“Fine strain. Wouldn't go out of my way to buy again but buds looked fantastic. Nice taste. Smooth, relaxed, sedated body high.”
“Knocks me out every time”
“nice flavor and effect.”
“sort of like eating a good tasting but super mild pepper, no?”

“great stuff, the inner colors of the buds had me giggly from start to finish. i loved breaking up the orange and green easter eggs to find a very dense purple crystal palace.  kinda got me in the eyes would need drops if i cared what others thought”
“Good strain with great flavor, Vaporize for best results. So smelly!”
“one of my new favs”

“Pretty goood PRETTY GOOD
mix it with a little wuki and BAME you feel so relaxed and at peace”
“Very relaxing, great for stress and pain.”

“When grown with love, Ace of Spades is fire! I love this strain.  Don't let the indica lable fool you, its not extremely sedative.  Made me more chatty and lively in social settings.  Great for passing around at parties and sharing with good friends!”
“The bud itself is very beautiful and easy to look at. Vaped one bowl of this magnificent bud and had deep couch lock”
“Another killer indica! love the taste and smell. For a seasoned smoker this strain does the job. Need to find some concentrate of ace of spades asap!”
“Nice hard buds with purple through our them good relaxing high heavy head high.”
“The Ace of Spades shatter is probably one of my all time favorite mixes!”
“Very good strain, put me asleep very quick. Don’t smoke this prior doing anything, makes everything very hard.”
“Few bong rips later I was ready to crash.”
“very good strain smells very citrusy really good high and smell”
“Very relaxing and happy. McKees you feel almost weightless.”
“totally worth the buy the effects are amazing totally a chill kick back high very nice smelling rich bud extremely puffy flowers”
“smells like pubes lol tastes like berry asshole. pretty good high tho”
“You know you've done good with the first hit. A nice earthy tone that leaves you able to focus on your interest or be content in your surroundings. A good sleeping aid.”
“Pick a quarter of this strain up the other day and it's flavor is some of the best I've ever tasted. I dry hit a joint for far longer than I ever anticipated”
“It helps me sleep and it leaves like new when I get up really good strean.”
“True to the taste nice earthy taste with a hint of sweet.. Nice euphoric feeling. Eases away the stress of a long day”
“Harsh, mad i have a half O. smells better than it smokes. the plat fire og i had last week was outstanding.”
“sweet and earthy, let's the mind drift”
“looks nice,  good effects but not the best taste. kind of spicy.”
“this strain is awesome and over off Astrozon and academy at A Cut Above you can enjoy too”
“A nice indica that is perfect for watching a movie.”
“A nice high a little bit of a creeper it slowly kicked in making me feel good”

“Great strain. Fruity and distinct smell, does not smell like Marijuana. Uplifted, easy going sense. Few rips will last a few hours. Be sure to have some food close by. I highly recommend Ace of Spades for day time smoking.”

“Friend got this for me as a present. It's like a rollercoaster of sativa and indica. I've never enjoyed such a strain. Although not the best in my list, this berry tasting bud is good if you prefer an enjoyable movie trip.”
“One of the nicest buds I've seen. Great color and flavor”
“We found these cookies to leave us feeling rather heavy. They also aren't all the great tasting.  Preferred the chocolate truffles for both flavor and effects.”
“I think ace of spades is deff my new fav A♤”

“Really nice indica. This batch was great... Right above 25% THC. Got to love those lab results ... & the effects were amazing & long lasting! Defiantly one of my new favorite indica's. Thank you Fusion Dispensaries of Wellton & TGA Genetics!!!! 💚OneLove”
“#Dank”
“mild indica  to vape. makes you sleepy bit not glued to the couch. very berry and citrusy, yet earthy/woody”
“I love this strain for back pain!! it's one of my favorites!”
“one of my favorite strains! super chill . relaxed euphoric high!  hunngry 2lol”
“Good mellow high. It doesn't hit real hard or last a very long time.  This sample was grown by Gecko Growers.”

“Very nice mild high. I for one don't want to be completely blitzed out of my mind every time I smoke. I like to have different strains for different occasions for me this is perfect for kicking back and watching youtube or Netflix after a long day at while still not wanting to sleep quite yet . I got it in the form of a Juju Joint something else I'm a big fan of.”
“too much stem in the pieces I got but the high was happy”
“Really good stone....”
“Love it, 70/30 my question is how do you get an indica strain from a sativa and hybrid?”

“I picked up a couple grams of Ace Of Spades and a new (four piece) grinder the other day. Last night, I got an amazing, full night of sleep. The sweet dirt/earth taste of this strain is mouth-watering and reminiscent of it's Black Cherry Soda parentage. The coloring of the nugs lies between greenish-purple (...gurple??) which makes the numerous orange hairs stand out beautifully. A pleasant, relaxing high, I fell asl...”
“Thats the way i like it baby”
“smokes good, high is high. not a coach lock high. I'm still able to function.”
“All of the above. I recommend use for anxiety stress depression and hunger. It definitely did the job!”

“Nice, sweet strain. I vape all my weed but I could still taste the sweetness of the bud. Kicks in a little slow but once it does, it kicks in hard. Helped my anxiety and depression and relaxed both body and mind. Great for chilling but I did notice it kept me up. Maybe not the best strain for before bed but overall it's great!”
“It had a very nice pungent berry smell and had the same taste. It makes you straight up happy and helped me with the back pain.”
“The best relief I've had in a while. Nice soothing effects with a slow come down. Nice!”

“I was extremely impressed with this strain; the dense and sticky nugs had a very unique odor that gave me a hint of the dankness to come. This weed left me with an absolutely insane body high that left me pretty much useless for awhile. Extremely relaxing effects- definetly good for listening to music or watching a movie. Recommend if you enjoy heavy indicas.”
“Awful! For some reason it created spasms in my feet and cramping. Felt like my toes were curling up! Eventually it went away, only plus it help my insomnia.”
“Beautiful sativa, with dense trichromes covered buds, perfect cured flowers.. Smooth smoke from organic soil”
“Had this in Florida - strong & relaxing.”
“This gave me an over all warm" feeling
column4: like the after effects of taking a shot of good rum
column5: with an extra "comfy/fuzzy" feeling in my pain spots. Made me feel relaxed and ready to drift off to sleep. worked great.”"

column3: “had to smoke a .5 gran joint just to get a buzz, when I did finally achieve my stoned state a few minutes later it was real mellow with a lite euphoria.”

“Ace of spades is listed as a indica dominate hybrid with a THC of 15.7 %

The high is an active mellow that is very functional for me as it is a lower THC. I like to have this when I have small projects to get done where I need to pay attention, but it's ok to be a little high. It's also good for movie watching as you're relaxed and alert but not so high you can't pay attention or your suspension of disbelief gets wo...”
“I got a cartridge of this from altitude the other day. Dont waste your money on this strain the high sucks balls. Maybe it is better in flower but the concentrate of this is shit.”
“Was so excited to try, because it's a hybrid of two amazing strains. Disappointed, not at all even the same high as you'd get from the original two strains. Too bad.”
“A very sweet smelling strain”
“Had me drooling😎”
